description: Letter dated 13/08/2008 from Andrey Chupin, Charge d'Affaires at the Embassy of the Russian Federation, to Baroness Hayman, Lord Speaker, regarding a statement by the Federal Assembly of Russia on the subject of the treatment of the people of South Ossetia by the rulers of Georgia. Incl. copy of the
department: Council of the Federation of the Federal Assembly of the Russian Federation
